author: cmpilato
msg: Fix some SEGFAULTers in the swig bindings.
property values before dereferencing their pointers.

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix issue #1369 - 'svn mkdir URL URL/subdir' core dump.
(mkdir_urls): If path condensation turned up an empty string for a
relative path, we have to resplit each path up a single path
component (you can't 'add' the root of an editor drive).
(basic_mkdir_url): Add -m to the mkdir command so editors don't pop
up in people's faces when they run the test. :-)
(test_funcs): No longer expect basic_mkdir_url() to fail.
